item.title: Combinatorics
item.description: I remember the first days that I entered high school, I was registered at a high school that specialized in sending students to national scientific olympiads and since I was very fond of my love of computers I wanted to participate in the computer national olympiad. However, this dream soon went into dust when I was first introduced to combinatorics. I had never seen a subject as vague as combinatorics. So many symbols and new operations.
